c1.name: "As One Might Stride Betwixt the Clouds"
c1.descriptionRaw:
After triggering the Elemental Absorption from the Passive Talent "Four Sealing Divination Charms," this instance of Lan Yan's Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Swallow-Wisp Pinion Dance</color> will produce another Feathermoon Ring when they are thrown at opponents.
You must first unlock the Passive Talent "Four Sealing Divination Charms."
c1.description:
After triggering the Elemental Absorption from the Passive Talent "Four Sealing Divination Charms," this instance of Lan Yan's Elemental Skill Swallow-Wisp Pinion Dance will produce another Feathermoon Ring when they are thrown at opponents.
You must first unlock the Passive Talent "Four Sealing Divination Charms."

c2.name: "Dance Vestments Billow Like Rainbow Jade"
c2.descriptionRaw: While the <color=#FFD780FF>Swallow-Wisp Shield</color> is active, when your active party member's Normal Attacks deal DMG, 40% of the Shield's DMG absorption will be restored, up to its original maximum absorption. This effect can occur once every 2s.
c2.description: While the Swallow-Wisp Shield is active, when your active party member's Normal Attacks deal DMG, 40% of the Shield's DMG absorption will be restored, up to its original maximum absorption. This effect can occur once every 2s.

c3.name: "On White Wings Pierce Through Cloud and Fog"
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Swallow-Wisp Pinion Dance</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Swallow-Wisp Pinion Dance by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: "With Drakefalcon's Blood-Pearls Adorned"
c4.descriptionRaw: After Lan Yan uses her Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Lustrous Moonrise</color>, the Elemental Mastery of all nearby party members increases by 60 for 12s.
c4.description: After Lan Yan uses her Elemental Burst Lustrous Moonrise, the Elemental Mastery of all nearby party members increases by 60 for 12s.

c5.name: "Having Met You, My Heart is Gladdened"
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Lustrous Moonrise</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Lustrous Moonrise by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: "Let Us Away on Sylphic Wing, the Silvered Ornaments to Ring"
c6.description: Swallow-Wisp Pinion Dance gains 1 additional charge.
